content:
Cocktail options for a holiday party: 

--White Christmas Mojito, made with white rum, coconut cream, mint leaves, lime juice, sugar or simple syrup, and seltzer
--Christmas Mule, made with vodka. lime juice, and ginger beer like a regular mule, but add muddled cranberries 
--Winter Wonderland martini, made with vodka, peppermint schnapps, and white chocolate liqueur
--Frostbite, made with tequila, white chocolate liqueur, creme de menthe, cream, and lime juice
--Cranberry Bramble, made with gin, cranberry juice, lemon juice, and orange juice
--Pink Bunny Pajamas, made with Bespoke bourbon cream, Citrus Forward gin, cranberry bitters, and simple syrup
--Cranberry Margarita, made with tequila, cranberry juice, lime juice, Cointreau, and simple syrup
--A Berry White Christmas, made with spiced rum, cranberry preserve, lime juice, and vanilla orgeat syrup
--Mistletoe Martini, made with vodka, cherry brandy, and lime juice, with raspberries for garnish

I'm hosting a holiday party and want to make batch cocktails ahead of time. These generally are ones that have juices in the mix.  Can you suggest three such cocktails I can make in large amounts at once?

chosen:
There are several cocktails on the list provided that contain juice that could be made ahead of time in larger quantities. Here are three good options:
The Cranberry Margarita, The Cranberry Bramble, and The A Berry White Christmas would all taste wonderful made in advance and served chilled at your holiday party. Enjoy your celebration! 
Happy Holidays! ❄️🎉🍹
rejected:
There are several cocktails on this list that would work well as batch cocktails since they contain juice that is typically available in large containers. Here are three suggestions:
The Winter Wonderland Martini, Cranberry Bramble, and A Berry White Christmas all use cranberry juice which comes in large bottles and would therefore be easy to prepare in advance. The recipes for these cocktails can be found below:
Winter Wonderland Martini
In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine 1 1/2 oz vodka, 3/4 oz peppermint schnapps, and 1/2 oz white chocolate liqueur. Shake until well-chilled, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a candy cane if desired.
Cranberry Bramble
Combine 2 oz gin, 1 oz fresh cranberry juice, 1 oz fresh lemon juice, and 1 oz fresh orange juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a skewered fruit piece (such as an orange slice and one or two fresh cranberries).
A Berry White Christmas
Fill a collins glass halfway with ice cubes. Add 1 1/2 oz spiced rum, 1/2 oz cranberry preserve, 1 oz lime juice, and 1 tsp vanilla orgeat syrup. Stir well to combine. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint and a few berries.

The Cranberry Margarita, The Cranberry Bramble, and The A Berry White Christmas would all taste wonderful made in advance and served chilled at your holiday party. Enjoy your celebration! 
Happy Holidays! ❄️🎉🍹
